message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than $8000. Considering its true worth, I propose a starting price of $10000. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price closer to its perceived value to me. My counteroffer is $8000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. To continue our discussion, I would like to propose a price of $9500 for the product. This price reflects its value to both of us while considering your budget constraints. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal, and I would like to counter with an offer of $8500. I hope this aligns better with the value you perceive in the product while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to present a revised price of $9000 for the product. This price aims to find a balance between the value we both place on the item while respecting your budgetary constraints. I hope this proposal is more suitable for your needs.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. Based on our previous discussions and my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $8750. I hope this proposal is acceptable and moves us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your thoughtful counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of our ongoing dialogue, I propose a final price of $8875 for the product. This price not only respects the value you see in the item but also allows us to reach a fair agreement. I hope this proposal is agreeable and brings us closer to closing the deal.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've carefully considered your proposal, and based on my budget constraints, I would like to counter with an offer of $8800. I hope this aligns better with the value you perceive in the product while still staying within my financial limits.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your financial considerations and appreciate your openness to negotiation. In light of our discussions, I propose a final price of $8750 for the product. This price aims to provide a fair compromise while respecting the value both of us place on the item. I hope this proposal is acceptable and allows us to conclude our negotiations successfully.
